subject: Ordered pedals from AliExpress
description_text:

I’ve ordered a set of p2-h2 from AliExpress.
I have these for about 2-3 weeks now, but today the brake pedal has
completely stopped working.
Could this be a broken wire to the loadcell?
 They aren’t a month old and already seem broken.

Sincerely,

Mark

Hi mark van laar,  At the moment, the brake’s RJ connector appears to be connected properly. Here’s what you can do: please update the firmware again, then reconfigure the offset, and finally test whether the pedal is functioning normally.      Please follow the steps below:    Press and hold the upgrade button on the PlusX main controller, then reconnect the USB cable.    Open SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 and check if it has entered recovery mode.    If recovery mode is detected, go to Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu.    After the update is complete, test the device to see if it has been restored successfully.

Regarding issue resolution, we handle problems separately through email and the chat tools provided by each platform, so they are not processed simultaneously, which may cause some discrepancies. If any issue arises, you can contact us through either channel until it is fully resolved.
